info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 4 at 12:22PM EDT by NWS Louisville KY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky...
Ohio River at McAlpine Upper affecting Jefferson, Oldham, Clark and Floyd Counties.
Ohio River at McAlpine Lower affecting Jefferson, Harrison, Clark, Hardin, Floyd and Meade Counties.
Ohio River at Clifty Creek affecting Trimble and Jefferson Counties.
.Heavy rain from the past few days will cause the river to rise.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ohio River at McAlpine Upper.
* WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Utica Pike floods at Duffy's Landing in Jeffersonville. At 32.0 feet, 2nd Street floodgate is closed. At 34.0 feet, Bingham Way is closed at floodgate. Water floods East Riverside Road near Fisherman's Wharf in Jeffersonville.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM EDT Friday the stage was 17.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning and continue rising to 35.5 feet early Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 35.7 feet on 02/26/2018. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk.
The next statement will be issued by Saturday afternoon at 200 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Clark, IN; Floyd, IN; Jefferson, KY; Oldham, KY
